H0.text: who was the president of pakistan during 1971 war. Ayub Khan

H1.text: who was the president of pakistan during 1971 war. Zulfikar Ali Bhutto

H2.text: who was the president of pakistan during 1971 war. Muhammad Zia-ul-Haq

H3.text: who was the president of pakistan during 1971 war. Yahya Khan

A4.text: Agha Muhammad Yahya Khan served as the third president of Pakistan from 1969 to 1971, under martial law.

A5.text: On 20 December 1971, Yahya Khan handed over the presidency and government to Zulfikar Ali Bhutto.

A6.text: Henry Kissinger and PM China discussed Yahya Khan and 1971 loss
